description: Helper component which contains various actions for image manipulation.
name: imageHelper
title: Image Helper

properties.description: Specifies the output file name for the result image.
properties.name: resultFileName
properties.label: Result File Name

actions.description: Crops an image to the specified dimensions.
actions.name: cropImage

properties.description: The horizontal starting point of the crop area
properties.name: x
properties.label: X Coordinate

properties.description: The vertical starting point of the crop area
properties.name: y
properties.label: Y Coordinate

properties.description: Specifies the output file name for the result image.
properties.name: resultFileName
properties.label: Result File Name

actions.title: Crop Image

properties.description: Specifies the output file name for the result image.
properties.name: resultFileName
properties.label: Result File Name

actions.description: Resizes an image to the specified width and height.
actions.name: resizeImage

properties.description: Specifies the output file name for the result image.
properties.name: resultFileName
properties.label: Result File Name

actions.title: Resize Image

actions.description: Rotates an image by a specified degree.
actions.name: rotateImage

properties.description: Specifies the degree of clockwise rotation applied to the image.
properties.name: degree
properties.label: Degree

properties.description: Specifies the output file name for the result image.
properties.name: resultFileName
properties.label: Result File Name

actions.title: Rotate Image
